00025 namespace util

00027 const char *logLevelName( LogLevel level )
00028 {
00029     switch( level ) {
00030     case error:
00031         return "error";
00032     case warning:
00033         return "warning";
00034     case notice:
00035         return "notice";
00036     case info:
00037         return "info";
00038     case verbose_info:
00039         return "verbose";
00040     }
00041 
00042     return "//no_log//";
00043 }
00044 
00045 void MessageHandlerBase::stopBelow( LogLevel stop )
00046 {
00047 #ifdef WIN32
00048     LOG( Debug, error ) << "Sorry stopping is not supported on Win32";
00049     return;
00050 #endif
00051 #ifdef NDEBUG
00052     LOG( Debug, error ) << "Wont apply stopping because NDEBUG is set";
00053     return;
00054 #endif
00055     m_stop_below = stop;
00056 }
00057 
00058 bool MessageHandlerBase::requestStop( LogLevel _level )
00059 {
00060     if ( m_stop_below > _level ) {
00061 #ifdef WIN32
00062         return false;
00063 #else
00064         return kill( getpid(), SIGTSTP ) == 0;
00065 #endif
00066     } else
00067         return false;
00068 }
00069 
00070 std::string Message::strTime()const
00071 {
00072     return boost::posix_time::to_simple_string( m_timeStamp );
00073 }
00074 
00075 Message::Message( std::string object, std::string module, std::string file, int line, LogLevel level, boost::weak_ptr<MessageHandlerBase> _commitTo )
00076     : commitTo( _commitTo ),
00077       m_object( object ),
00078       m_module( module ),
00079       m_file( file ),
00080       m_timeStamp( boost::posix_time::second_clock::universal_time() ),
00081       m_line( line ),
00082       m_level( level )
00083 {}
00084 
00085 Message::Message( const Message &src ) //we need a custom copy-constructor, because the copy-contructor of ostringstream is private
00086     : std::ostringstream( src.str() ),
00087       commitTo( src.commitTo ),
00088       m_object( src.m_object ),
00089       m_module( src.m_module ),
00090       m_file( src.m_file ),
00091       m_subjects( src.m_subjects ),
00092       m_timeStamp( src.m_timeStamp ),
00093       m_line( src.m_line ),
00094       m_level( src.m_level )
00095 {}
00096 
00097 Message::~Message()
00098 {
00099     if ( shouldCommit() ) {
00100         commitTo.lock()->commit( *this );
00101         str( "" );
00102         clear();
00103         commitTo.lock()->requestStop( m_level );
00104     }
00105 }
00106 
00107 
00108 std::string Message::merge()const
00109 {
00110     std::string ret( str() );
00111     size_t found = std::string::npos;
00112     std::list<std::string>::const_iterator subj = m_subjects.begin();
00113 
00114     if ( ( found = ret.find( "{o}" ) ) != std::string::npos )
00115         ret.replace( found, 3, m_object );
00116 
00117     found = 0;
00118 
00119     while ( ( found = ret.find( "{s}", found ) ) != std::string::npos )
00120         ret.replace( found, 3, std::string( "\"" ) + * ( subj++ ) + "\"" );
00121 
00122     return ret;
00123 }
00124 
00125 bool Message::shouldCommit()const
00126 {
00127     if( str().empty() )
00128         return false;
00129 
00130     const boost::shared_ptr<MessageHandlerBase> buff( commitTo.lock() );
00131 
00132     if ( buff )
00133         return ( buff->m_level >= m_level );
00134     else return false;
00135 }
00136 
00137 LogLevel MessageHandlerBase::m_stop_below = error;
00138 
00139 
00140 std::ostream *DefaultMsgPrint::o = &::std::cerr;
00141 void DefaultMsgPrint::commit( const Message &mesg )
00142 {
00143     if( last.empty() || last != mesg.str() ) {
00144         *o << mesg.m_module << ":" << logLevelName( mesg.m_level );
00145 #ifndef NDEBUG //if with debug-info
00146         *o << "[" << mesg.m_file.leaf() << ":" << mesg.m_line << "] "; //print the file and the line
00147 #else
00148         *o << "[" << mesg.m_object << "] "; //print the object/method
00149 #endif //NDEBUG
00150         *o << mesg.merge(); //print the message itself
00151         *o << std::endl;
00152         last = mesg.str();
00153     }
00154 }
00155 
00156 void DefaultMsgPrint::setStream( ::std::ostream &_o )
00157 {
00158     o->flush();
00159     o = &_o;
00160 }
00161 
00162 }
